values: Do Not Avenge Yourselves, but Give Place to WrathDo Not Avenge Yourselves, but Give Place to Wrath

When we lay down the burden of vengeance, God will pick it up and carry it out. No sin will go unpunished from the God who sees all.When we lay down the burden of vengeance, God will pick it up and carry it out. No sin will go unpunished from the God who sees all.
